thread.title: Associate Executive Director - Salinas - Sports and Fitness
thread.title_full: Associate Executive Director - Salinas - Sports and Fitness

title: Associate Executive Director - Salinas - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: Oversees membership sales and touch program, creating a welcoming culture for prospective new members. Utilizes excellent communication, listening skills and interview techniques to match new members with their needs and interests.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
